languages.text:
{n}Из под маски Ноктюрна Забвения доносится {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}печальный вздох{/d}.{/n}
"Постылый змей обвил мое чело
И, стиснув шею, поглотил слова —
То горечь предсказуемой развязки.
Прощай, Купец Бездомный, и умри —
Укроет занавес тебя как саван.
Довольно слов — пусть молвит танец наш".

traits.locale_text: "Посеяв горечь, горечь и пожнешь, Купец Бездомный. Краток был наш путь совместных песен — теперь споет клинок. Развязки время!"

languages.text:
{n}A {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}sorrowful sigh{/d} comes from beneath Nocturne of Oblivion's mask.{/n}
"About my neck a loathsome coiling snake
Has latched itself and swallowed down my lines.
So trite an end tastes bitter on the tongue,
For death awaits, my Merchant Vagabond,
The curtain now will serve you as a shroud.
Enough of words — our dance will speak the rest."
languages.original_text:
{n}Из под маски Ноктюрна Забвения доносится {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}печальный вздох{/d}.{/n}

languages.text:
{n}{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}悲痛なため息{/d}が、忘却のノクターンの仮面から漏れ出す。{/n}
「僕の首に巻き付くひどく不快な蛇は
自らにくらいつき僕の台詞を呑む。
使い古されきった結末は舌の上で苦く感じる。
死が待っているぞ、僕の放浪せし商人よ、
今や幕は君の死装束となろう。
言葉はもう十分…僕らのダンスがあとは語る」
languages.original_text:
{n}A {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}sorrowful sigh{/d} comes from beneath Nocturne of Oblivion's mask.{/n}
"About my neck a loathsome coiling snake

So trite an end tastes bitter on the tongue,

The curtain now will serve you as a shroud.

「僕の首に巻き付くひどく不快な蛇は
自らにくらいつき僕の台詞を呑む。

今や幕は君の死装束となろう。
言葉はもう十分…僕らのダンスがあとは語る」

languages.text:
{n}遗忘夜曲的面具之下传来一声{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}悲叹{/d}。{/n}
“可憎的毒蛇缠着我的颈脖，
将我的诗句悉数吞没。
你的结局如此老套，令我的舌头发苦。
四处漂泊的商人啊，死亡正等你上路。
舞台大幕此刻将成为你的裹尸布，
言尽于此，其余交由我们的舞步。”
languages.original_text:
{n}A {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}sorrowful sigh{/d} comes from beneath Nocturne of Oblivion's mask.{/n}
"About my neck a loathsome coiling snake
Has latched itself and swallowed down my lines.
So trite an end tastes bitter on the tongue,
For death awaits, my Merchant Vagabond,
The curtain now will serve you as a shroud.
Enough of words — our dance will speak the rest."

languages.text:
{n}Un {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}soupir affligé{/d} s'échappe du masque du Nocturne de l'Oubli.{/n}
« Autour de mon cou, un odieux serpent
S'est enroulé pour me voler ma voix.
Cette fin galvaudée laisse un goût navrant,
Car, {mf|mon Marchand Vagabond|ma Marchande Vagabonde}, la mort vous attend,
Et sur vous le rideau se fermera.
À présent, laissons notre danse parler pour nous. »
languages.original_text:
{n}A {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}sorrowful sigh{/d} comes from beneath Nocturne of Oblivion's mask.{/n}
"About my neck a loathsome coiling snake
Has latched itself and swallowed down my lines.
So trite an end tastes bitter on the tongue,
For death awaits, my Merchant Vagabond,
The curtain now will serve you as a shroud.
Enough of words — our dance will speak the rest."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Un soupir affligé s'échappe du masque du Nocturne de l'Oubli.{/n}
« Autour de mon cou, un odieux serpent
S'est enroulé pour me voler ma voix.
Cette fin galvaudée laisse un goût navrant,
Car, {mf|mon Marchand Vagabond|ma Marchande Vagabonde}, la mort vous attend,
Et sur vous le rideau se fermera.
Assez parlé... Nous dirons le reste en dansant. »

languages.text:
{n}Un {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}suspiro de dolor{/d} emerge bajo la máscara de Nocturno del Olvido:{/n}
«Sobre mi cuello una serpiente repugnante
se ha enroscado y tragado mis versos.
Un final tan trillado, mi Mercader Errante,
no gusta porque la muerte aguarda
y ahora el telón le servirá de mortaja.
Ya basta de palabras; el resto lo decidirá nuestra danza».
languages.original_text:
{n}A {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}sorrowful sigh{/d} comes from beneath Nocturne of Oblivion's mask.{/n}
"About my neck a loathsome coiling snake

So trite an end tastes bitter on the tongue,
For death awaits, my Merchant Vagabond,
The curtain now will serve you as a shroud.
Enough of words — our dance will speak the rest."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Un suspiro de dolor emerge de debajo de la máscara de Nocturno del Olvido:{/n}
«Sobre mi cuello una serpiente repugnante
se ha enroscado y tragado mis versos.
Un final tan trillado, mi Mercader Errante,
no gusta porque la muerte aguarda
y ahora el telón le servirá de mortaja.
Ya basta de palabras; el resto lo decidirá nuestra danza».

languages.text:
{n}Ein {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}sorgenvolles Seufzen{/d} ertönt unter der Maske von Nocturne des Nichts.{/n}
"Die verhasste Schlange an meinem Hals,
Sie verschlingt sich selbst und meine Zeilen.
Ein so tristes Ende schmeckt stets bitter,
Denn der Tod wartet, mein Händlervagabund.
Der Vorhang dient Euch fortan als Schleier.
Genug der Worte, nun folgt unser Tanz."
languages.original_text:
{n}A {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}sorrowful sigh{/d} comes from beneath Nocturne of Oblivion's mask.{/n}

languages.text:
{n}Nisyan Noktürnü'nün maskesinin ardından {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}kederli bir iç çekiş{/d} duyuluyor.{/n}
"Boynumun etrafını menfur bir yılan sarmış,
Tutunmuş sapasağlam, sözlerimi kendine öğün yapmış.
Öyle bilindik bir son yazılmış ki dilde acı bir tat bırakmış.
Pek Berduş Tüccar, ölümdür seni bekleyecek.
Perde, artık sana kefen olarak hizmet verecek.
Bu kadar söz yeter, gerisini dansımız söyleyecek."
languages.original_text:
{n}A {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ZanniNotEnemy}sorrowful sigh{/d} comes from beneath Nocturne of Oblivion's mask.{/n}
